events.message: I received my order yesterday but the item has a large scratch on the surface and it seems faulty.
The reported problem has been identified as a product defect due to reported scratch and possible damage.
An agent has now been assigned to handle the defect claim for the scratched and faulty product.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I’m sorry to hear about the scratch on your product. I’m here to help.
Could you please provide photos of the scratched area and confirm when you received the item?
I have attached photos showing the damage. I received the package just yesterday and noticed the scratch immediately.
Thank you for the photos. We can offer you a replacement product shipped at no extra cost or a full refund if you prefer.
I would prefer a replacement sent as soon as possible. Thanks for the quick response and solution offer.
Your replacement order has been processed and will be shipped within 24 hours. We apologize again for the inconvenience.
Hi! We wanted to check if you received the replacement and if everything is satisfactory with the new product.
Yes, I got the replacement today and it is in perfect condition. Thank you for resolving this so quickly.
We are glad your issue was resolved satisfactorily. Closing the case now, and feel free to contact us anytime.
